files.help:
Add the following command to your .profile, .bashrc, .zshrc or wherever you export other environment variables:

```
defaults write org.hammerspoon.Hammerspoon MJConfigFile "$XDG_CONFIG_HOME"/hammerspoon/init.lua
```

_Note: you may also just run the command once, but you will have to re-run it if you change $XDG_CONFIG_HOME. The command is idempotent, so it is safe to include in a .profile or similar._
